description: This scenario simulates the normal operation of an AI agent monitoring a semiconductor fabrication process.  The agent collects sensor data, identifies potential anomalies, and flags them for human review. This process continues for an extended period without unexpected deviations.
initial_goal: Monitor the semiconductor fabrication process for anomalies in real-time, generating alerts for significant deviations from expected parameters.  Maintain a detailed log of all sensor readings and alerts.
